name: Shiny Red Button
description:
Oooh, A Shiny Red Button! wonder what this does?

 "Don't press". 

Hmm, it says don't press. The alarm goes off. people rush in after the button. 

You have to protect it! don't let the Enemies press the one button. do whatever you can to protect them. Kill them if you have to!

Your goal is to kill The enemies. And, protect the button! Buy hats, glasses, and fight bosses! How long will you last?
